sig_info: A thick polymer suit enhances Rhino's gamma-based strength and resilience, increasing his Physical Resistance by up to 260.47 to 1054.84 based on current Health. Additionally, when entering the fight with full Health, Rhino's Armor provides an additional 300 Physical Resistance.

PASSIVE: A layer of Armor provides an additional 425.32 Armor Rating.
Impacts from Rhino's Dash attacks have a chance to be Unblockable. This chance decreases the bigger the opponent is.
WHEN ATTACKED: 10% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 6.50 seconds, granting +48.72 Attack.
ALL ATTACKS: Rhino triggers his Fury effect by using a Medium Attack to end a 5 hit Attack Combo while his opponent is pinned against the wall.
DASH ATTACKS: Rhino becomes Unstoppable when Dashing towards the enemy.
